name: HarukaAya
description: Telegram's sassiest group manager. Modular Telegram group management bot!

API_KEY.description: Your bot token, as a string.

OWNER_USERNAME.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable webhooks when in env mode messages

MESSAGE_DUMP.description: The Heroku App URL similar to https://<appname>.herokuapp.com/

GBAN_DUMP.description: optional: a chat where your replied saved messages are stored, to stop people deleting their old

LOAD.description: A space separated list of user_ids which should be considered sudo users

NO_LOAD.description: A space separated list of user_ids which should be considered support users (can gban/ungban, nothing else)

STRICT_ANTISPAM.description: A space separated list of user_ids which should be considered whitelisted - they can't be banned.

WORKERS.description: Optional: link where you would like to receive donations.

DEEPFRY_TOKEN.description: Port to use for your webhooks

DEL_CMDS.description: Whether to delete commands from users which don't have rights to use that command

SW_API.description: Enforce gbans across new groups as well as old groups. When a gbanned user talks, he will be banned.

SUDO_USERS.description: Whether to allow using exclamation marks ! for commands as well as /.

SUPPORT_USERS.description: Which sticker to use when banning people. Use https://telegram.dog/ShowJsonBot to get the file_id
